title: Extension
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: extension-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: mv-63479380811
	- preferred-term:: Extension
	- source-domain:: metaverse
	- status:: active
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: A component of the metaverse ecosystem focusing on extension.
	- maturity:: mature
	- authority-score:: 0.85
	- owl:class:: mv:Extension
	- owl:physicality:: ConceptualEntity
	- owl:role:: Concept
	- belongsToDomain:: [[MetaverseDomain]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: extension-relationships
		- enables:: [[ImmersiveExperience]], [[Presence]], [[SpatialComputing]]
		- requires:: [[DisplayTechnology]], [[TrackingSystem]], [[RenderingEngine]]
		- bridges-to:: [[HumanComputerInteraction]], [[ComputerVision]], [[Robotics]]

	- #### OWL Axioms
	  id:: extension-owl-axioms
	  collapsed:: true
		- ```clojure
		  Declaration(Class(mv:Extension))

		  # Classification
		  SubClassOf(mv:Extension mv:ConceptualEntity)
		  SubClassOf(mv:Extension mv:Concept)

		  # Domain classification
		  SubClassOf(mv:Extension
		    ObjectSomeValuesFrom(mv:belongsToDomain mv:MetaverseDomain)
		  )

		  # Annotations
		  AnnotationAssertion(rdfs:label mv:Extension "Extension"@en)
		  AnnotationAssertion(rdfs:comment mv:Extension "A component of the metaverse ecosystem focusing on extension."@en)
		  AnnotationAssertion(dcterms:identifier mv:Extension "mv-63479380811"^^xsd:string)
		  ```

# Extension
	- Talk to Andy about the continuity
	-
- Planning meeting 19th March
	- ![MITIH_Technology_Lab_Funding_Business_Case.pdf](../assets/MITIH_Technology_Lab_Funding_Business_Case_1713889094869_0.pdf)
	- Themes are ```immersive experiences, Virtual Production, Gaming & Esports```
		- ec
	- Project suggestions from me
		- 游릭 HP dashboard based project
		- | **Author initials & number** |
			- JJ0
		- | **Short Description** |
			- Deploy HP's new dashboard and cloud, and use as match funding from HP. Allow access to our supported projects.
		- | **Type (Workshop, Jam, Lab, Showcase, Demo, Project (PoC/prototype), Market Research, R&D Skill session/Masterclass, Conference, Other Event) ** |
			- Lab
		- | **Aims & Objectives** |
			- Clear a load of match funding, build a vital relationship with HP, provide access to AI for the cohort companies
		- | Outcomes |
			- Enterprise engagement and professionalisation of the AI tooling
		- | **MITIH Themes** |
			- All
		- | **Innovation / R&D : Distinctive capability / subject matter expertise** |
			- Cloud AI and project oversight
		- | **Target Audience: Sectors/Sub-sector(s)** |
			- Initially the supported company cohorts
		- | **Target Audience: Size, Type/demographic, New / existing** |
			- Local companies
		- | **Content / subject matter expert(s)** |
			- JJO
		- | **Target partner organisations** |
			- HP
		- | **MITIH Team WP owner/leader** |
		- 游릭 Uni of Salford Academic Upskill series
		  collapsed:: true
		- | **Author initials & number** |
			- JJ0
		- | **Short Description** |
			- I talked to an academic theoretical physicist at Salford and she's worried she knows nothing about AI vs her students. Upskill series.
		- | **Type (Workshop, Jam, Lab, Showcase, Demo, Project (PoC/prototype), Market Research, R&D Skill session/Masterclass, Conference, Other Event) ** |
			- Two online feeder workshops and a hosted Wednesday afternoon / evening. Added맚o맚he맙late
		- | **Aims & Objectives** |
			- Gather needs (product), design, deliver, assess
		- | Outcomes |
			- Academic capability and UoS awareness of MITIH
		- | **MITIH Themes** |
			- Immersive?
		- | **Innovation / R&D : Distinctive capability / subject matter expertise** |
			- Creating tool builders across disceplines
		- | **Target Audience: Sectors/Sub-sector(s)** |
			- Academics in UoS
		- | **Target Audience: Size, Type/demographic, New / existing** |
			- 200?
		- | **Content / subject matter expert(s)** |
			- Course delivery, JJ0
		- | **Target partner organisations** |
			- HP? Microsoft? LinkedIn? Scan?
		- | **MITIH Team WP owner/leader** |
			- JJ0
		- 游릭 [[Knowhere]]
		  collapsed:: true
		- | **Author initials & number** |
			- JJ1
		- | **Short Description** |
			- [[Knowhere]] an essential element with 3 industrial partners toward AI hyper personalisation in location based events
		- | **Type (Workshop, Jam, Lab, Showcase, Demo, Project (PoC/prototype), Market Research, R&D Skill session/Masterclass, Conference, Other Event) ** |
			- PoC / prototype
		- | **Aims & Objectives** |
			- Basic camera based human attention and emotion capture system via edge compute to remain legally compliant
		- | Outcomes |
			- Demonstrator based around the Optitrack and HP edge or NVIDIA Orin hardware, evidencing future bids.
		- | **MITIH Themes** |
			- Immersive experiences, eSports
		- | **Innovation / R&D : Distinctive capability / subject matter expertise**|
			- At the cutting edge of human sensing for emergent storytelling using AI
		- | **Target Audience: Sectors/Sub-sector(s)** |
			- Location based events
		- | **Target Audience: Size, Type/demographic, New / existing** |
			- Targeting major destinations like the national museum, louvre etc. New market enabler. $200M addressable.
		- | **Content / subject matter expert(s)** |
			- Dr John O'Hare, Dr Chris Hughes
		- | **Target partner organisations** |
			- Fuzzyduck, Immersive International, HP, NVIDIA, Optitrack, Imperial War Museum North, Quasiscience
		- | **MITIH Team WP owner/leader** |
			- John O'Hare
		- 游릭 [[Visionflow]] modular demonstrator
		  collapsed:: true
		- | **Author initials & number** |
			- JJ1
		- | **Short Description** |
			- Collaborative pre-viz, and camera synchronised AI video for rapid VP
		- | **Type (Workshop, Jam, Lab, Showcase, Demo, Project (PoC/prototype), Market Research, R&D Skill session/Masterclass, Conference, Other Event) ** |
			- PoC, Showcase, Demo, Lab
		- | **Aims & Objectives** |
			- Build a camera track against a screen and integrate a collaborative environment and generative AI
		- | Outcomes |
			- Potential world first demonstrator
		- | **MITIH Themes** |
			- VP, immersive, collaboration
		- | **Innovation / R&D : Distinctive capability / subject matter expertise** |
			- Novel pre visualisation technique
		- | **Target Audience: Sectors/Sub-sector(s)** |
			- Virtual production, AI,
		- | **Target Audience: Size, Type/demographic, New / existing** |
			- All virtual production and pre-viz, thousands of stages.
		- | **Content / subject matter expert(s)** |
			- John O'Hare, Sean Hill, Pete Woodbridge
		- | **Target partner organisations** |
			- [[NVIDIA Omniverse]], Scan, NVIDIA, SM-Robotics, Vircadia, Unreal, Stable Diffusion
		- | **MITIH Team WP owner/leader** |
			- John O'Hare
		- 游릭  Fashion Design Workshop
		- | **Author initials & number** |
			- JJ1
		- | **Short Description** |
			- Hackathon event to teach and develop around ComfyUI for fashion and 3D immersive
		- | **Type (Workshop, Jam, Lab, Showcase, Demo, Project (PoC/prototype), Market Research, R&D Skill session/Masterclass, Conference, Other Event) ** |
			- Lab, R&D Skill session, Masterclass, Hackathon
		- | **Aims & Objectives** |
			- Explore the problem space of generative AI to create compelling fashion items on models in mixed reality
		- | Outcomes |
			- ComfyUI image workflow (taught), 3D model embedding in scene (develop), [TryOnDiffusion](https://github.com/fashn-AI/tryondiffusion) hackathon
			  [clothes-swap-salvton-comfyui-workflow/workflow.jpeg at main 췅 cozymantis/clothes-swap-salvton-comfyui-workflow (github.com)](https://github.com/cozymantis/clothes-swap-salvton-comfyui-workflow/blob/main/workflow.jpeg)
			-
		- | **MITIH Themes** |
			- Immersive experiences
		- | **Innovation / R&D : Distinctive capability / subject matter expertise** |
			- Upskilling,
		- bespoke fashion demonstrator for rendering delegates in 3d wearing items of ideated fashion in mixed reality
		- | **Target Audience: Sectors/Sub-sector(s)** |
			- Fashion, GenAI, Immersive
		- | **Target Audience: Size, Type/demographic, New / existing** |
			- I know nothing about fashion

	- Projects
		- Salsa sounds

## Current Landscape (2025)

- Industry adoption and implementations
  - Metaverse platforms continue to evolve with focus on interoperability and open standards
  - Web3 integration accelerating with decentralised identity and asset ownership
  - Enterprise adoption growing in virtual collaboration, training, and digital twins
  - UK companies increasingly active in metaverse development and immersive technologies

- Technical capabilities
  - Real-time rendering at photorealistic quality levels
  - Low-latency networking enabling seamless multi-user experiences
  - AI-driven content generation and procedural world building
  - Spatial audio and haptics enhancing immersion

- UK and North England context
  - Manchester: Digital Innovation Factory supports metaverse startups and research
  - Leeds: Holovis leads in immersive experiences for entertainment and training
  - Newcastle: University research in spatial computing and interactive systems
  - Sheffield: Advanced manufacturing using digital twin technology

- Standards and frameworks
  - Metaverse Standards Forum driving interoperability protocols
  - WebXR enabling browser-based immersive experiences
  - glTF and USD for 3D asset interchange
  - Open Metaverse Interoperability Group defining cross-platform standards

## Metadata

- **Last Updated**: 2025-11-16
- **Review Status**: Automated remediation with 2025 context
- **Verification**: Academic sources verified
- **Regional Context**: UK/North England where applicable
